account_select_description(context=EBala.receive: The account we are receiving from
account_select_description(context=EBala.send: The account we are sending to

converted_amount_input_description(conte.receive: Click on "=" to convert the receive amount
converted_amount_input_description(conte.send: Click on "=" to convert the send amount

start_account.title: Account
start_account.description:
First, you need to create an account where you can add new transactions. Later, there will be an option to create other accounts. This account is not linked to a real bank account.

You can either create a new account or import your data from the "export_mony.json" file or from a CSV file from other apps.
